statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_statuses;
SELECT id, status FROM transaction_statuses ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM transaction_statuses WHERE status = 'processing';
SELECT * FROM transaction_statuses WHERE update_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT status, COUNT(*) FROM transaction_statuses GROUP BY status ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_statuses WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT id, status FROM transaction_statuses WHERE update_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM transaction_statuses ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, COUNT(*) FROM transaction_statuses GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, status, update_time FROM transaction_statuses WHERE status IN ('pending', 'failed') ORDER BY update_time;
SELECT * FROM transaction_statuses;
SELECT id, status FROM transaction_statuses WHERE status='Completed';
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM transaction_statuses ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_updates WHERE transaction_id=1001;
SELECT update_id, update_message FROM payment_updates WHERE update_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY update_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_statuses WHERE status='pending';
SELECT id, transaction_id, status FROM transaction_statuses ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT update_id, transaction_id, update_message FROM payment_updates WHERE update_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT status, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_statuses GROUP BY status HAVING total_transactions > 10;
SELECT ts.id AS transaction_id, pu.update_message AS payment_update_message FROM transaction_statuses ts JOIN payment_updates pu ON ts.transaction_id = pu.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_timestamp FROM transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'completed';
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT transaction_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM transaction_logs GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING total_logs > 5;

SELECT u.user_name, t.transaction_amount, tl.log_message FROM users u INNER JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.transaction_id INNER JOIN transaction_logs tl ON tl.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.transaction_status = 'success';

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, tl.log_timestamp FROM transactions t INNER JOIN transaction_logs tl ON t.transaction_id = tl.transaction_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY tl.log_timestamp DESC;

SELECT u.user_name, t.transaction_amount, tl.log_message FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.transaction_id JOIN transaction_logs tl ON tl.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE tl.log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT u.user_name, t.transaction_amount FROM users u LEFT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.transaction_id IS NULL;
SELECT t.transaction_amount AS amount, tl.log_message AS message FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN transaction_logs tl ON t.transaction_id = tl.transaction_id ORDER BY amount ASC, message DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_updates ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, log_message, logged_at FROM transaction_logs WHERE logged_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT history_id, history_description FROM transaction_history WHERE history_time < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY history_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, status, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_updates JOIN payment_transactions ON transaction_updates.transaction_id = payment_transactions.transaction_id;
SELECT transaction_id, log_message, logged_at FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_id = 'abc-123';
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE status = 'Approved'
SELECT * FROM transactions_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM transactions WHERE status='Approved';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT method_name FROM payment_methods WHERE active = TRUE ORDER BY method_id DESC;
SELECT error_id, error_message FROM transaction_errors WHERE error_message LIKE '%timeout%';
